entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
